text: S. M. Sirajul Islam Suruj is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Bogra-6. ==Career== Suruj was elected to parliament from Bogra-6 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. Following the 15 August 1975 Bangladesh coup d'état he was arrested. He was sentenced to four years imprisonment by a military court on 3 August 1975. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: S. M. Sirajul Islam Suruj
